mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT u.users_number, COALESCE(n.users_name, c.users_name) AS users_name, u.users_id, COALESCE(n.users_email, c.users_email) AS users_email, COALESCE(n.users_phone, c.users_phone) AS users_phone, u.users_type FROM tbl_users u LEFT JOIN tbl_normal_users n ON u.users_number = n.users_number LEFT JOIN tbl_care_users c ON u.users_number = c.users_number ORDER BY u.users_number DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT COALESCE(n.users_name, c.users_name) AS users_name, u.users_type, u.users_created_date, COALESCE(n.users_address_line1, c.users_address_line1) AS users_address_line1, COALESCE(n.users_address_line2, c.users_address_line2) AS users_address_line2, COALESCE(n.users_phone, c.users_phone) AS users_phone, COALESCE(n.users_email, c.users_email) AS users_email, u.users_id, u.users_password, u.users_point FROM tbl_users u LEFT JOIN tbl_normal_users n ON u.users_number = n.users_number LEFT JOIN tbl_care_users c ON u.users_number = c.users_number WHERE u.users_number = #{usersNumber} ORDER BY u.users_number DESC
